item.title: Aborea - Attention Werwolf!
item.description: Have a nice day to you all and have fun with “Aborea - Attention Werewolf! “Aborea - Attention Werewolf!” is an extension for the roleplaying game Aborea. It is about the fact that on the last day of every month some rational beings with a weak immune system become werewolves and try to destroy all life. However, at the beginning of the next month they become normal again and cannot remember anything!

item.title: Dice cards
item.description: Dice cards - What is that? Whoever does not have a certain dice at hand, but needs it to be able to play, can download these alternative “dice”. For example, if you need a W6, you can cut out the dice cards with the required numbers and throw them into a container. If you want to throw the dice, reach in without looking and pull out one of the dice cards.

item.title: Aborea - Zombie Apocalypse Mode!
item.description: “Aborea - Zombie Apocalypse Mode” is an expansion for the tabletop role playing game Aborea. It is about a zombie apocalypse on the continent of Palea. A constant fight for survival begins! Have fun reading and playing! item.title: My first Post
item.description: Me, that is Aufiblue, invent and develop pen and paper role playing games. There is still a lot planned! Me and my technical support named Martin have been working a lot on this website. It is much more flexible than the old one and I have much more room for manoeuvre. Now I even have a blog and can write entries! This would hardly have been possible on the old site.
